name: h3
description: The 2026 Rawlings Icon Drop 10 USA Baseball Bat is a game-changer for players seeking a balanced swing feel. Certified by USA Baseball, this bat features a 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter, making it perfect for both contact and power hitters. Its sleek mint and black colorway is complemented by the advanced In/Tense Carbon Composite, which optimizes barrel performance and enhances the trampoline effect. With Zero Loss Energy Technology, players experience reduced drag and minimized hand vibration, while the Tuned Balanced Performance adjusts to each batter's unique swing. Additionally, the RevGrip provides superior tack and cushioning, ensuring a comfortable and secure grip during play. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
